name: Platypus Finance
introduce: Platypus Finance is a single-sided Automatic Market Maker (AMM) for stablecoins built on the Avalanche network that is designed to optimize capital efficiency. Rather than requiring liquidity providers (LPs) to provide liquidity through token pairs (e.g. ETH-AVAX), LPs can simply provide liquidity through the provision of a single token type. This mechanism aims to improve upon the existing AMM framework by mitigating impermanent loss risk for LPs, reducing slippage for traders, and creating more capital efficiency throughout the broader ecosystem.
